mapper.select: SELECT MWR.WO_RESULT_ID , MWR.WO_RESULT_ID AS KEY_ID , TO_CHAR(MWR.WORK_DAY ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESULT_CREATE_DATE , TO_CHAR(MWR.START_TIME ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS START_TIME , TO_CHAR(MWR.END_TIME ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS END_TIME , MWR.WORK_CENTER_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_WORK_CENTER_NAME(MWR.COMPANY_CD, MWR.DIVISION_CD, MWR.WORK_CENTER_CD) FROM DUAL) AS WORK_CENTER_NM , MWR.GOOD_QTY , MWR.DEFECT_QTY , DECODE(MWR.STATE, 'C', (MWR.GOOD_QTY * -1), NULL) AS GOOD_CANCEL_QTY , DECODE(MWR.STATE, 'C', (MWR.DEFECT_QTY * -1), NULL) AS DEFECT_CANCEL_QTY , MWR.SHIFT_CD AS SHIFT_DETAIL_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_SHIFT_DETAIL_NAME(MWR.COMPANY_CD, MWR.DIVISION_CD, MWR.SHIFT_CD) FROM DUAL) AS SHIFT_DETAIL_NM , MWR.STATE AS RESULT_STATE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MWR.COMPANY_CD, MWR.DIVISION_CD, 'PP0009', MWR.STATE, 'KR') FROM DUAL) AS RESULT_STATE_NM , MWR.CREATE_BY AS RESULT_CREATE_BY ,(SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MWR.COMPANY_CD, MWR.DIVISION_CD, MWR.CREATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS RESULT_CREATE_BY_NM , MWR.UPDATE_BY AS RESULT_CANCEL_BY ,(SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MWR.COMPANY_CD, MWR.DIVISION_CD, MWR.UPDATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS RESULT_CANCEL_BY_NM , TO_CHAR(MWR.CANCEL_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESULT_CANCEL_DATE , MWR.DESCRIPTION , MWR.WORK_ORDER_ID , MWR.COMPANY_CD , MWR.DIVISION_CD FROM MOM_WO_RESULT MWR WHERE MWR.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MWR.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MWR.WORK_ORDER_ID = #{workOrderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MWR.WO_RESULT_ID
